forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High around 20C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 69F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear early then increasing cloudiness after midnight. Low 57F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 67F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 73F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.title: Thursday
